channel.title: 2 Problems. [HELP PLZ]
channel.description:
1.) Okay, first problem is that everytime i make a change (character rights, what shops sell, monster hp, ect...) i compile, it compiles perfectly with no errors, and then i run server but the changes to not take effect. Why is this?
2.) Now, i set up a no-ip account. I told my friend the ip (Hellascape.servegame.com) and he tried to connect, but it didnt work. So then we tried dare i say....hamachi. And he could actually connect, and i saw him for a good 5 seconds. But for him he only saw the black loading screen and it would never load. I think this is because he lags with hamachi open but my no-ip should work still.. so please help me.
Thanks, it's greatly appriciated. :)

  1. set your playerrights in client.java

1.) Okay, first problem is that everytime i make a change (character rights, what shops sell, monster hp, ect…) i compile, it compiles perfectly with no errors, and then i run server but the changes to not take effect. Why is this?

2.) Now, i set up a no-ip account. I told my friend the ip (Hellascape.servegame.com) and he tried to connect, but it didnt work. So then we tried dare i say…hamachi. And he could actually connect, and i saw him for a good 5 seconds. But for him he only saw the black loading screen and it would never load. I think this is because he lags with hamachi open but my no-ip should work still… so please help me.
